verbs.description: < p > U.S. President Donald Trump 's former campaign manager Paul Manafort [V: will] be arraigned on Friday following a third superseding indictment against him by Special Counsel Robert Mueller that lodged additional charges on accusations of witness tampering.</p >

< p > U.S. President Donald Trump 's former campaign manager Paul Manafort will [V: be] arraigned on Friday following a third superseding indictment against him by Special Counsel Robert Mueller that lodged additional charges on accusations of witness tampering.</p >

[ARGM-ADV: <] p > [ARG1: U.S. President Donald Trump 's former campaign manager Paul Manafort] [ARGM-MOD: will] be [V: arraigned] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARGM-TMP: following a third superseding indictment against him by Special Counsel Robert Mueller that lodged additional charges on accusations of witness tampering.</p >]

< p > U.S. President Donald Trump 's former campaign manager Paul Manafort will be arraigned on Friday [V: following] [ARG2: a third superseding indictment against him by Special Counsel Robert Mueller that lodged additional charges on accusations of witness tampering.</p] >

< p > U.S. President Donald Trump 's former campaign manager Paul Manafort will be arraigned on Friday following [ARG0: a third superseding indictment against him by Special Counsel Robert Mueller] [R-ARG0: that] [V: lodged] [ARG1: additional charges] [ARG3: on accusations of witness] tampering.</p >
